content: this is the crochet pattern for pumpkin this is a beginner-friendly pattern perfect for those just learning amigurumi pdf pattern is written in us crochet terms difficulty beginner skills needed chain single_crochet increases decreases materials needed - 3 00 mm crochet hook - approximately 30 yards of dk weight yarn in orange - a few yards of brown yarn for stem - tapestry needle - polyester stuffing - locking stitch markers optional
